comment: Huge group project, vague instructions, gives feedback on worksheets AFTER revision deadline has passed , takes off points from everyone if someone else does not do the work. She does not know the material. She has been proven wrong by her students numerous times. Rude in emails. Tests are from PP. Tough grader for someone who is wish washy

DO NOT TAKE THIS PROFESSOR. Taking her was the dumbest mistake I have ever made. She is really disorganized, she doesn't know the material and when I confronted her about it she was very confrontational. I am never going to make a mistake like this again.

She was everywhere, very unorganized and never replied to my emails. I wouldn't recommend taking her. However if you take her be prepare for a huge group project that counts for a big part of your grade.

Nice lady, but one of the worst professors I have ever had in my life. She reads off power points, and is unclear about how she grades things. She assigns a HUGE group project, that includes things you have never heard about in the class. STAY AWAY!

Wow don't take her. She was all over the place, and not helpful at all. Said quizzes would only help you.. LIE. You can tell she doesn't know anything about marketing, but what she can read on the powerpoint. Just avoid her especially if you want to learn something.
